meanings.definition: Dirty or unclean in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The dorty dog rolled in mud and made a mess.
meanings.sent2: She tried to clean her dorty shoes after walking in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The dorty pig played in the dirt and had a blast.
meanings.sent4: The dorty streets of the old town whispered tales of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The dorty room smelled of old socks and dampness.
